scripts.test:debug: NODE_ENV=testing node --inspect-brk -r module-alias/register -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/.bin/jest -c .jest-unit.json --runInBand
scripts.e2e:debug: NODE_ENV=e2e node --inspect-brk=0.0.0.0:9229 -r module-alias/register -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/.bin/jest -c .jest-e2e.json --runInBand
scripts.dev: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=development LOG_LEVEL=debug tsc-watch --preserveWatchOutput -w --noEmitOnError false --onSuccess "node -r module-alias/register -r source-map-support/register ./build/identity-backend/src/index.js"
scripts.dev-win: npm run clean && tsc-watch --preserveWatchOutput -w --noEmitOnError false --onSuccess "node -r module-alias/register -r source-map-support/register ./build/identity-backend/src/index.js"
scripts.dev:debug: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=development LOG_LEVEL=debug tsc-watch --preserveWatchOutput -w --noEmitOnError false --onSuccess "node -r module-alias/register -r source-map-support/register --inspect-brk=0.0.0.0:9222 ./build/identity-backend/src/index.js"
scripts.compile:production: npm run clean && echo Compiling... && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.check: npm run check:lint && npm run check:format
scripts.fix: npm run fix:lint && npm run fix:format
